abstract: BP says Anadarko Petroleum, partner in the well that exploded in the Gulf of Mexico, agrees to pay $4 billion to settle claims related to the ensuing oil spill.
snippet: Anadarko held a 25 percent share in the Gulf of Mexico well that blew out last year, causing the largest oil spill in U.S. history.
lead_paragraph: Anadarko held a 25 percent share in the Gulf of Mexico well that blew out last year, causing the largest oil spill in U.S. history.
